name: Astro Dice Wars
description:
Controls:

Move: W/A/S/D

Camera Rotation: Q/E

Throw Dice: Left Mouse Button

Rules:

Throw Dice on the Ground to Capture the Area.

The area will be captured according to the dice's value.

The Person With More Captured Tiles at the end of all turns Wins.

Capturing the whole grid will result in direct victory.

Tiles with the opponent's dice on them will not be captured, if the fill force is smaller than its value. 

If you throw on a tile with an opponent's dice on it and your value is less then it, your dice will be destroyed.
